law.text:
As used in KRS 173.310 to 173.410, unless the context requires a different meaning:
"Governmental unit" means any county or city; except a city of the first class and a county containing a city of the first class;
"Legislative body" means the governing body of a governmental unit; and
"Library" means a free public library supported in whole or in part with money derived from taxation, and governed by a board as provided for in KRS 173.340, excluding a city of the first class and a county containing a city of the first class.
